content: it is with great joy that i can show you new first crochet along nuts about squares this cal is not so much my design because the squares are designed by others but it is my selection nuts about squares is a blanket with 35 lovely squares designed by 11 talented crochet designers some of them are well known and admired for their fabulous designs others are perhaps less known contributing designers are dedri uys helen shrimpton polly plum sigrun hugoey melissa green heather gibbs julie yeager margaret macinnis susan stevens/mellie blossom aurora suominen and tatsiana kupryianchyk each square has been carefully selected to ensure that the squares work together well in their look and feel each part has a video tutorial in english and written instructions in english and dutch the cal starts on 31 march 2017
